content: It’s not great. I know it isn’t. Lighting, visibility etc. But I broke past something I thought I’d never have the courage to do. Of course I don’t know if I’d have done it without people backing me up on it. But the first one is done and I know the next one can be so much better! And most importantly, I WANT to do the second one. It was scary. But getting something done, is pretty darn satisfying.
